title: Pressed with Arden Myrin
itunes:title: Pressed with Arden Myrin
description:
Arden Myrin (Shameless, Insatiable, Will You Accept This Rose?) joins the 'boys to discuss Boston accents, the Rat Pack, and what they like to eat on a hot day before a review of Pressed. Plus, a new segment, How Munch?

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
